sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  Box,
  Heading,
  Text,
  VStack,
  Container,
  Stack,
  Center,
  Link,
  Icon,
  Grid,
  GridItem,
  useColorModeValue
} from '@chakra-ui/react';
import { FaArrowRight } from 'react-icons/fa';
import ChapterApplicationForm from './ChapterForm'; // Assuming the form is in the same directory
import './hoverEffect.css'; // Custom CSS file for hover effect

const ChapterApplicationPage = () => {
  return (
    <Box bg={useColorModeValue('gray.50', 'gray.800')} py={10}>
      <Container maxW="7xl">
        <VStack spacing={8} textAlign="center">
          <Box
            bg="gray.50"
            borderRadius="50px"
            border="1px solid"
            borderColor="gray.400"
            p={1} // Reduced padding to make it smaller
            mb={4}
            display="inline-block"
          >
            <Text fontSize="sm" color="gray.700" display="flex" alignItems="center" gap={1}>
              Want more info? <Link href="mailto:info@example.com" color="blue.500" fontSize="sm">Email us <Icon as={FaArrowRight} ml={1} w={3} h={3} /></Link>
            </Text>
          </Box>
          <Heading as="h1" size="2xl" fontWeight="bold" color="gray.700">
            Chapter Application
          </Heading>
          <Text fontSize="lg" color="gray.700">
            Join our community and start a new chapter. Fill out the application form below and our team will get back to you soon.
          </Text>
        </VStack>
        <Box mt={10} textAlign="center">
          <Heading as="h2" size="xl" mb={6} color="gray.700">
            Why Should You Start a Chapter?
          </Heading>
          <Grid templateColumns="repeat(3, 1fr)" gap={6}>
            <GridItem className="gridItem" border="1px" borderColor="gray.300" p={6} borderRadius="md">
              <Heading as="h3" size="lg" color="gray.700">Benefit 1</Heading>
              <Text fontSize="md" color="gray.600">Description of why starting a chapter is beneficial for you.</Text>
            </GridItem>
            <GridItem className="gridItem" border="1px" borderColor="gray.300" p={6} borderRadius="md">
              <Heading as="h3" size="lg" color="gray.700">Benefit 2</Heading>
              <Text fontSize="md" color="gray.600">Another reason to consider starting a chapter.</Text>
            </GridItem>
            <GridItem className="gridItem" border="1px" borderColor="gray.300" p={6} borderRadius="md">
              <Heading as="h3" size="lg" color="gray.700">Benefit 3</Heading>
              <Text fontSize="md" color="gray.600">Further explanation of the advantages of starting a chapter.</Text>
            </GridItem>
          </Grid>
        </Box>
        <Center mt={10}>
          <Stack
            bg={useColorModeValue('white', 'gray.700')}
            p={8}
            borderRadius="lg"
            boxShadow="lg"
            w={{ base: '100%', md: '80%', lg: '60%' }}
          >
            <ChapterApplicationForm />
          </Stack>
        </Center>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default ChapterApplicationPage;
